To open the files, download WinRAR and extract it to the folder ( "C:\program files\FretsOnFire\data\songs" this is standard i think).

The official site free 30 days: http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar380.exe

Or the Piratebay one(use this one of course):
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4505441/WinRAR_3.80_Professional

One can never be too precise! (or mabye u can) but anyways this should solve your problem! :)

For those who don't know what to do:

1 : Download the file
2 : Unzip the winrar file to C:\program files\frets on fire\data\songs (or wherever u installed the game)
(3) : for those who doesn't have winrar, goto http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm and download ur language.
4 : ROCK ON!! :D
